body:
Alright, I'm leaving. No this is not gonna be archived, like the other one. I have recently done something on avicus, which I highly regret. People are pissed at me, from what I have done, also some staff members. 70 people saw what I did, and its becoming excessive. I did something stupid, something that I never want to do again. It's been a good 2 years, banned for 1 year, but who cares. 

Thanks to:

Dawson: We had our ups and downs, maybe 100 times when we were pissed at eachother, hey atleast we're friends :)

Xenarch, Vincible, Furible: Thanks guys :) 

Avicus Staff: I have had fights with you guys, which was stupid of me. You guys are awesome

The community: Probably, the most coolest/nicest community ever.

I'm not quitting minecraft, I will be playing other servers. 

Good bye everybody

replies.body:
I'm not dealing with another fake leaving thread from you. You also can't "cover it up", I'm done with this behavior.

Don't bother to make any more, please.
